Movie.Title: Limitless
Movie.Plot: With the help of a mysterious pill that enables the user to access one hundred percent of his brain abilities, a struggling writer becomes a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with lots of dangers.

Movie.Title: Holiday in the Wild
Movie.Plot: Jilted by her husband on the eve of embarking on an African safari, a woman travels to the continent alone where she meets an elephant conservationist.

Movie.Title: Perfect Strangers
Movie.Plot: Seven long-time friends get together for a dinner. When they decide to share with each other the content of every text message, email and phone call they receive, many secrets start to unveil and the equilibrium trembles.

Movie.Title: The Wandering Earth
Movie.Plot: As the sun is dying out, people all around the world build giant planet thrusters to move Earth out of its orbit and sail Earth to a new star system. Yet the 2500-year journey comes with unexpected dangers, and in order to save humanity, a group of young people in this age of a wandering Earth fight hard for the survival of humankind.

Movie.Title: Hook
Movie.Plot: When Captain Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

Movie.Title: BlacKkKlansman
Movie.Plot: Ron Stallworth, an African American police officer from Colorado Springs, CO, successfully manages to infiltrate the local Ku Klux Klan branch with the help of a Jewish surrogate who eventually becomes its leader. Based on actual events.

Movie.Title: The Straight Story
Movie.Plot: An old man makes a long journey by lawnmower to mend his relationship with an ill brother.

Movie.Title: The Cloverfield Paradox
Movie.Plot: Orbiting a planet on the brink of war, scientists test a device to solve an energy crisis, and end up face-to-face with a dark alternate reality.

Movie.Title: The Highwaymen
Movie.Plot: A pair of Texas Rangers come out of retirement to catch the infamous outlaws Bonnie and Clyde.

Movie.Title: Hidden Figures
Movie.Plot: The story of a team of female African-American mathematicians who served a vital role in NASA during the early years of the U.S. space program.

Movie.Title: Your Name
Movie.Plot: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

Movie.Title: Murder by Numbers
Movie.Plot: Two gifted high school students execute a "perfect" murder - then become engaged in an intellectual contest with a seasoned homicide detective.

Movie.Title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
Movie.Plot: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.

Movie.Title: Overboard
Movie.Plot: After a spoiled, wealthy yacht owner is thrown overboard and loses his memory, a mistreated employee convinces him that he is her working-class husband.

Movie.Title: Lars and the Real Girl
Movie.Plot: A delusional young man strikes up an unconventional relationship with a doll he finds on the Internet.

Movie.Title: Peter Rabbit
Movie.Plot: Feature adaptation of Beatrix Potter's classic tale of a rebellious rabbit trying to sneak into a farmer's vegetable garden.

Movie.Title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
Movie.Plot: In 1957, archaeologist and adventurer Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. is called back into action and becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

Movie.Title: And So It Goes
Movie.Plot: A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.

Movie.Title: PK
Movie.Plot: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of religion on its people.

Movie.Title: Adventures of Arsene Lupin
Movie.Plot: As the daring thief Arsène Lupin (Duris) ransacks the homes of wealthy Parisians, the police, with a secret weapon in their arsenal, attempt to ferret him out.

Movie.Title: Iron Sky
Movie.Plot: The Nazis set up a secret base on the dark side of the moon in 1945 where they hide out and plan to return to power in 2018.

Movie.Title: On the Other Side of the Tracks
Movie.Plot: Two mismatched cops team up to investigate the murder of a business mogul's wife.

Movie.Title: Brigsby Bear
Movie.Plot: Brigsby Bear Adventures is a children's TV show produced for an audience of one: James. When the show abruptly ends, James's life changes forever, and he sets out to finish the story ...

Movie.Title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
Movie.Plot: The infamous story of Benjamin Barker, a.k.a. Sweeney Todd, who sets up a barber shop down in London which is the basis for a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett. Based on the hit Broadway musical.

Movie.Title: The Forbidden Kingdom
Movie.Plot: A discovery made by a kung fu obsessed American teen sends him on an adventure to China, where he joins up with a band of martial arts warriors in order to free the imprisoned Monkey King.

Movie.Title: Captain Fantastic
Movie.Plot: In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

Movie.Title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
Movie.Plot: A murder mystery brings together a private eye, a struggling actress, and a thief masquerading as an actor.

Movie.Title: The Good Thief
Movie.Plot: An aging gambler on a losing streak attempts to rob a casino in Monte Carlo. But someone's already tipped off the cops before he even makes a move.

Movie.Title: Naked
Movie.Plot: Nervous about finally getting married, a guy is forced to relive the same nerve-wracking hours over and over again until he gets things right on his wedding day.

Movie.Title: Ghost Town
Movie.Plot: Bertram Pincus is a man whose people skills leave much to be desired. When Pincus dies unexpectedly, but is miraculously revived after seven minutes, he wakes up to discover that he now has the annoying ability to see ghosts.

Movie.Title: Trance
Movie.Plot: A fine art auctioneer mixed up with a gang, joins forces with a hypnotherapist to recover a lost painting. As boundaries between desire, reality and hypnotic suggestion begin to blur, the stakes rise faster than anyone could have anticipated.

Movie.Title: Look Who's Back
Movie.Plot: Adolf Hitler wakes up in the 21st century. He quickly gains media attention, but while Germany finds him hilarious and charming, Hitler makes some serious observations about society.

Movie.Title: Demain tout commence
Movie.Plot: Samuel parties hard in the Marseille area of France and is awoken one morning by a woman carrying a baby she claims is his. She drives off leaving him with a wailing infant; he gives chase to London where he finds work and raises Gloria by himself.

Movie.Title: Murder by Death
Movie.Plot: Five famous literary detective characters and their sidekicks are invited to a bizarre mansion to solve an even stranger mystery.

Movie.Title: Burn After Reading
Movie.Plot: A disk containing the memoirs of a CIA agent ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous gym employees who attempt to sell it.

Movie.Title: The 101-Year-Old Man Who Skipped Out on the Bill and Disappeared

Alternatives.Title: Hundraettåringen som smet från notan och försvann

Movie.Plot: The 101 year old man Allan Karlsson goes through Europe in search for a Russian soda recipe he lost during the early 70s. Unfortunately, he is not the only one who is looking for it.

Movie.Title: Freaky Deaky
Movie.Plot: Set in 1974, a pair of '60s radicals rely on their bomb-making skills on their way to becoming capitalists.

Movie.Title: The Book Thief
Movie.Plot: While subjected to the horrors of World War II Germany, young Liesel finds solace by stealing books and sharing them with others. In the basement of her home, a Jewish refugee is being protected by her adoptive parents.

Movie.Title: In Bruges
Movie.Plot: Guilt-stricken after a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

Movie.Title: The Impossible
Movie.Plot: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

Movie.Title: The 100 Year-Old Man Who Climbed Out the Window and Disappeared

Alternatives.Title: Hundraåringen som klev ut genom fönstret och försvann

Movie.Plot: After living a long and colorful life, Allan Karlsson finds himself stuck in a nursing home. On his 100th birthday, he leaps out a window and begins an unexpected journey.

Movie.Title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
Movie.Plot: A national manhunt is ordered for a rebellious kid and his foster uncle who go missing in the wild New Zealand bush.

Movie.Title: The Others
Movie.Plot: A woman who lives in a darkened old house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that her family home is haunted.

Movie.Title: Margin Call
Movie.Plot: Follows the key people at an investment bank, over a 24-hour period, during the early stages of the 2008 financial crisis.

Movie.Title: The Adventures of Mark Twain
Movie.Plot: Tom Sawyer, Becky Thatcher and Huck Finn join Mark Twain on his airship to meet Halley's Comet.

Movie.Title: Now You See Me 2
Movie.Plot: The Four Horsemen resurface and are forcibly recruited by a tech genius to pull off their most impossible heist yet.

Movie.Title: Miss Meadows
Movie.Plot: A story centered on a proper elementary school teacher who moonlights as a vigilante.

Movie.Title: The Do-Over
Movie.Plot: Two down-on-their-luck guys decide to fake their own deaths and start over with new identities, only to find the people they're pretending to be are in even deeper trouble.

Movie.Title: Big Fish
Movie.Plot: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

Movie.Title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
Movie.Plot: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

Movie.Title: Danny Collins
Movie.Plot: An aging rock star decides to change his life when he discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon.

Movie.Title: The Ridiculous 6
Movie.Plot: An outlaw who was raised by Native Americans discovers that he has five half-brothers; together the men go on a mission to find their wayward, deadbeat dad.

Movie.Title: Experimenter
Movie.Plot: In 1961, famed social psychologist Stanley Milgram conducted a series of radical behavior experiments that tested ordinary humans willingness to obey authority.

Movie.Title: Accused
Movie.Plot: A young assistant DA puts a serial killing nurse behind bars, only to discover evidence that may prove her innocence.

Movie.Title: The Fox & the Child
Movie.Plot: It has been described as both a nature documentary and a 'fairy tale' look at the story of young girl and her friendship with a fox.

Movie.Title: Smokey and the Bandit
Movie.Plot: The Bandit is hired on to run a tractor trailer full of beer over county lines in hot pursuit by a pesky sheriff.

Movie.Title: Ex Machina
Movie.Plot: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in artificial intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breath-taking female A.I.

Movie.Title: Magic in the Moonlight
Movie.Plot: A romantic comedy about an Englishman brought in to help unmask a possible swindle. Personal and professional complications ensue.

Movie.Title: Now You See Me
Movie.Plot: An FBI agent and an Interpol detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances and reward their audiences with the money.

Movie.Title: Real Steel
Movie.Plot: In the near future, robot boxing is a top sport. A struggling promoter feels he's found a champion in a discarded robot.

Movie.Title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
Movie.Plot: As a cowardly farmer begins to fall for the mysterious new woman in town, he must put his new-found courage to the test when her husband, a notorious gun-slinger, announces his arrival.

Movie.Title: Thelma & Louise
Movie.Plot: An Arkansas waitress and a housewife shoot a rapist and take off in a '66 Thunderbird.

Movie.Title: Elysium
Movie.Plot: In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.

Movie.Title: The Castle
Movie.Plot: A working-class family from Melbourne, Australia fights city hall after being told they must vacate their beloved family home to allow for infrastructural expansion.

Movie.Title: Rebel Without a Cause
Movie.Plot: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

Movie.Title: What We Do in the Shadows
Movie.Plot: Viago, Deacon, and Vladislav are vampires who are finding that modern life has them struggling with the mundane - like paying rent, keeping up with the chore wheel, trying to get into nightclubs, and overcoming flatmate conflicts.

Movie.Title: Silver Linings Playbook
Movie.Plot: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

Movie.Title: Snowpiercer
Movie.Plot: Set in a future where a failed climate-change experiment kills all life on the planet except for a lucky few who boarded the Snowpiercer, a train that travels around the globe, where a class system emerges.

Movie.Title: A Serious Man
Movie.Plot: Larry Gopnik, a Midwestern mathematics teacher, watches his life unravel over multiple sudden incidents. Though seeking meaning and answers amidst his turmoils, he seems to keep sinking.

Movie.Title: Her
Movie.Plot: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with his newly purchased operating system that's designed to meet his every need.

Movie.Title: The Fourth State
Movie.Plot: A journalist gets caught up in a terrorist plot in Moscow while investigating the Russian secret service.

Movie.Title: Noah
Movie.Plot: A man is chosen by his world's creator to undertake a momentous mission before an apocalyptic flood cleanses the world.

Movie.Title: Welcome
Movie.Plot: Bilal is 17 years old, a Kurdish boy from Iraq. He sets off on an adventure-filled journey across Europe. He wants to get to England to see his love who lives there. Bilal finally reaches ...

Movie.Title: The Green Hornet
Movie.Plot: Following the death of his father, Britt Reid, heir to his father's large company, teams up with his late dad's assistant Kato to become a masked crime fighting team.

Movie.Title: Dexter the Dragon & Bumble the Bear

Alternatives.Title: Als je begrijpt wat ik bedoel

Movie.Plot: Bumble the Bear (Olivier Bommel) finds an egg that, it turns out, has a cute little dragon in it. However, this dinosaur grows huge every time it is upset. As this causes a lot of problems, Ollie Bommel has to face a difficult dilemma.

Movie.Title: The Hurricane
Movie.Plot: The story of Rubin 'Hurricane' Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.

Movie.Title: Sideways
Movie.Plot: Two men reaching middle age with not much to show but disappointment, embark on a week long road trip through California's wine country, just as one is about to take a trip down the aisle.

Movie.Title: Praybeyt Benjamin
Movie.Plot: A gay that wants to prove himself on being brave by joining the Military. Then he met his friends and they're all not passed the training. But they became a hero from saving their leaders

Movie.Title: Mary Poppins
Movie.Plot: A magic nanny comes to work for a cold banker's unhappy family.

Movie.Title: Looper
Movie.Plot: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits - someone like Joe - who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by sending back Joe's future self for assassination.

Movie.Title: Much Ado About Nothing
Movie.Plot: A modern retelling of Shakespeare's classic comedy about two pairs of lovers with different takes on romance and a way with words.
'21' is the fact-based story about six MIT students who were trained to become experts in card counting and subsequently took Vegas casinos for millions in winnings.

Movie.Title: The Invisible Man
Movie.Plot: A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.

Movie.Title: Monsters University
Movie.Plot: A look at the relationship between Mike and Sulley during their days at Monsters University -- when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.

Movie.Title: Hope Springs
Movie.Plot: After thirty years of marriage, a middle-aged couple attends an intense, week-long counseling session to work on their relationship.

Movie.Title: The Odd Life of Timothy Green
Movie.Plot: A childless couple bury a box in their backyard, containing all of their wishes for an infant. Soon, a child is born, though Timothy Green is not all that he appears.

Movie.Title: White Fang
Movie.Plot: Jack London's classic adventure story about the friendship developed between a Yukon gold hunter and the mixed dog-wolf he rescues from the hands of a man who mistreats him.

Movie.Title: Seven Psychopaths
Movie.Plot: A struggling screenwriter inadvertently becomes entangled in the Los Angeles criminal underworld after his oddball friends kidnap a gangster's beloved Shih Tzu.

Movie.Title: Warm Bodies
Movie.Plot: After R (a highly unusual zombie) saves Julie from an attack, the two form a relationship that sets in motion a sequence of events that might transform the entire lifeless world.

Movie.Title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
Movie.Plot: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.

Movie.Title: How to Steal a Million
Movie.Plot: Romantic comedy about a woman who must steal a statue from a Paris museum to help conceal her father's art forgeries, and the man who helps her.

Movie.Title: The Man from Earth
Movie.Plot: The movie begins with Professor John Oldman packing his belongings onto his truck, preparing to move to a new home.

Movie.Title: Source Code
Movie.Plot: An action thriller centered on a soldier who wakes up in the body of an unknown man and discovers he's part of a mission to find the bomber of a Chicago commuter train.

Movie.Title: The Sting
Movie.Plot: In 1930s Chicago, a young con man seeking revenge for his murdered partner teams up with a master of the big con to win a fortune from a criminal banker.

Movie.Title: Barney's Version
Movie.Plot: The picaresque and touching story of the politically incorrect, fully lived life of the impulsive, irascible and fearlessly blunt Barney Panofsky.

Movie.Title: The Solitude of Prime Numbers
Movie.Plot: Non-linearly follows two kids, rejected by their peers, who become friends. They separate later in life and dedicate to their careers. Still, they feel as if something is missing.

Movie.Title: The Skeleton Key
Movie.Plot: A hospice nurse working at a spooky New Orleans plantation home finds herself entangled in a mystery involving the house's dark past.

Movie.Title: Ripley Under Ground
Movie.Plot: After his friend, a hot young artist, is killed, a resourceful American man living in London covers...

Movie.Title: Galaxy Quest
Movie.Plot: The alumni cast of a cult space TV show have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help.

Movie.Title: Deliverance
Movie.Plot: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's turned into one huge lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a river-rafting trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

Movie.Title: District 9
Movie.Plot: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly finds a kindred spirit in a government agent who is exposed to their biotechnology.

Movie.Title: 88 Minutes
Movie.Plot: On the day that a serial killer that he helped put away is supposed to be executed, a noted forensic psychologist and college professor receives a call informing him that he has 88 minutes left to live.

Movie.Title: Fermat's Room
Movie.Plot: Four mathematicians who do not know each other are invited by a mysterious host on the pretext of resolving a great enigma...

Movie.Title: Exit Through the Gift Shop
Movie.Plot: The story of how an eccentric French shop keeper and amateur film maker attempted to locate and befriend Banksy...

Movie.Title: The Secret World of Arrietty

Alternatives.Title: 借りぐらしのアリエッティ
Kari-gurashi no Arietti

Movie.Plot: The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their daughter, Arrietty, is discovered.

Movie.Title: Léon: The Professional
Movie.Plot: A professional assassin rescues a teenage girl whose parents were killed in a police raid.

Movie.Title: Fallen
Movie.Plot: Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.

Movie.Title: The Diving Bell and the Butterfly
Movie.Plot: The true story of Elle editor Jean-Dominique Bauby who suffers a stroke and has to live with an almost totally paralyzed body; only his left eye isn't paralyzed.

Movie.Title: The Last King of Scotland
Movie.Plot: Based on the events of the brutal Ugandan dictator Idi Amin's regime as seen by his personal physician during the 1970s

Movie.Title: The Invention of Lying
Movie.Plot: A comedy set in a world where no one has ever lied, until a writer seizes the opportunity for personal gain.

Movie.Title: Secret Window
Movie.Plot: A writer is accused for plagiarism by a strange man, who then starts haunting him for 'justice.'

Movie.Title: Fracture
Movie.Plot: An attorney intent on climbing the career ladder toward success, finds an unlikely opponent in a manipulative criminal he's trying to prosecute.

Movie.Title: The Last Airbender
Movie.Plot: The story follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must put his childhood ways aside and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water, Earth and Air nations.

Movie.Title: Welcome to the Sticks
Movie.Plot: Although living a comfortable life in Salon-de-Provence, a charming town in the South of France, Julie has been feeling depressed for a while...

Movie.Title: Elsa & Fred
Movie.Plot: When the retired seventy-seven years old hypochondriac widower Fred moves to an apartment in Madrid...

Movie.Title: A Film with Me in It
Movie.Plot: A broke, jobless actor and a broke, jobless screenwriter set out to make a movie and then find that life starts imitating art.

Movie.Title: Ray
Movie.Plot: The life and career of the legendary popular music pianist, Ray Charles.

Movie.Title: Desert Saints
Movie.Plot: The nature of temptation. Banks is a hit man, the best, usually working for Latin American drug cartels...

Movie.Title: D.O.A.
Movie.Plot: Dexter Cornell, an English Professor becomes embroiled in a series of murders involving people around him...

Movie.Title: The Red Violin
Movie.Plot: A perfect red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

Movie.Title: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus
Movie.Plot: A traveling theater company gives its audience much more than they were expecting.

Movie.Title: Tideland
Movie.Plot: A lonely girl gets trapped in an eerie fantasy world after her irresponsible parents die.

Movie.Title: (500) Days of Summer
Movie.Plot: An offbeat romantic comedy about a woman who doesn't believe true love exists, and the young man who falls for her.

Movie.Title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
Movie.Plot: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with bizarre consequences.

Movie.Title: The Time Traveler's Wife
Movie.Plot: A romantic drama about a Chicago librarian with a gene that causes him to involuntarily time travel, and the complications it creates for his marriage.

Movie.Title: The Name of the Rose
Movie.Plot: An intellectually nonconformist monk investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

Movie.Title: A Summer in Genoa
Movie.Plot: A man moves his two daughters to Italy after their mother dies in a car accident, in order to revitalize their lives. Genova changes all three of them as the youngest daughter starts to see the ghost of her mother, while the older one discovers her sexuality.

Movie.Title: The Book of Eli
Movie.Plot: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.

Movie.Title: The Children of Huang Shi
Movie.Plot: About young British journalist, George Hogg, who with the assistance of a courageous Australian nurse, saves a group of orphaned children during the Japanese occupation of China in 1937.

Movie.Title: Micmacs
Movie.Plot: A man and his friends come up with an intricate and original plan to destroy two big weapons manufacturers.

Movie.Title: Bonnie and Clyde
Movie.Plot: A somewhat romanticized account of the career of the notoriously violent bank robbing couple and their gang.

Movie.Title: The Good Shepherd
Movie.Plot: The tumultuous early history of the Central Intelligence Agency is viewed through the prism of one man's life.

Movie.Title: Snatch.
Movie.Plot: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

Movie.Title: The Painted Veil
Movie.Plot: A British medical doctor fights a cholera outbreak in a small Chinese village, while also being trapped at home in a loveless marriage to an unfaithful wife.

Movie.Title: Ratcatcher
Movie.Plot: Glasgow, summer, 1973. Dustmen are striking; bags of garbage add to the blight of council flats and a fetid canal...

Movie.Title: Moon
Movie.Plot: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.

Movie.Title: The General's Daughter
Movie.Plot: When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.

Movie.Title: The Black Balloon
Movie.Plot: All Thomas wants is a normal adolescence but his autistic brother, Charlie, thwarts his every opportunity. Will Thomas, with the help of his girlfriend, Jackie, accept his brother?

Movie.Title: Impostor
Movie.Plot: Originally a 30 minute portion for an anthology film, Impostor was retooled into a full length feature film...

Movie.Title: The Illusionist
Movie.Plot: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

Movie.Title: Blink
Movie.Plot: Emma is an attractive girl in her 20s who has been blind for 20 years. A new type of eye operation partially restores her sight...

Movie.Title: The Brothers Bloom
Movie.Plot: The Brothers Bloom are the best con men in the world, swindling millionaires with complex scenarios of lust and intrigue. Now they've decided to take on one last job - showing a beautiful and eccentric heiress the time of her life with a romantic adventure that takes them around the world.

Movie.Title: Knowing
Movie.Plot: A teacher opens a time capsule that has been dug up at his son's elementary school; in it are some chilling predictions -- some that have already occurred and others that are about to -- that lead him to believe his family plays a role in the events that are about to unfold.

Movie.Title: The Last Don
Movie.Plot: Sprawling Mario Puzo novel about an Italian family of gangsters draws the inevitable comparison to 'The Godfather'...

Movie.Title: Ben X
Movie.Plot: As an alternative to getting bullied at school, an autistic teenager retreats into the world of online role-playing games.

Movie.Title: Waking Life
Movie.Plot: A man shuffles through a dream meeting various people and discussing the meanings and purposes of the universe.

Movie.Title: Dopamine
Movie.Plot: A San Franciscan computer programmer falls in love with one his creations in the days after the dot.com boom.

Movie.Title: Futurama: Into the Wild Green Yonder
Movie.Plot: Dark forces older than time itself are on the attack, hell-bent on stopping the dawn of a wondrous new green age...

Movie.Title: Donnie Brasco
Movie.Plot: An FBI undercover agent infilitrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life to the expense of his regular one.

Movie.Title: Het bittere kruid
Movie.Plot: 15 year old Sara, a Jewish girl living in the Netherlands during the German occupation slowly begins to realize the danger she and her family are in...

Movie.Title: Together
Movie.Plot: A violin prodigy and his father travel to Beijing, where the father seeks the means to his son's success while the son struggles to accept the path laid before him.

Movie.Title: 21 Grams
Movie.Plot: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother and a born-again ex-con.

Movie.Title: Amsterdamned
Movie.Plot: A mysterious diver hiding in Amsterdam's canal system embarks on a rampage of gruesome murders, terrifying...

Movie.Title: There Will Be Blood
Movie.Plot: A story about family, greed, religion, and oil, centered around a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

Movie.Title: Matando Cabos
Movie.Plot: A dark, offbeat comedy about a group of Mexico City teens embroiled in a kidnapping involving a retired wrestling legend and a parrot.

Movie.Title: Juno
Movie.Plot: Faced with an unplanned pregnancy, an offbeat young woman makes an unusual decision regarding her unborn child.

Movie.Title: P.S. I Love You
Movie.Plot: A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.

Movie.Title: Vanilla Sky
Movie.Plot: A successful publisher finds his life taking a turn for the surreal after a car accident with a jaded lover.

Movie.Title: Human Traffic
Movie.Plot: Five friends spend one lost weekend in a mix of music, love and club culture.

Movie.Title: Solaris
Movie.Plot: A troubled psychologist is sent to investigate the crew of an isolated research station orbiting a bizarre planet.

Movie.Title: The King of Comedy
Movie.Plot: Aspiring comic Rupert Pupkin wants to achieve success in showbiz, by resorting to stalking his idol, a late night talk show host who craves his own privacy.

Movie.Title: Into the Wild
Movie.Plot: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

Movie.Title: The Prestige
Movie.Plot: The rivalry between two magicians is exacerbated when one of them performs the ultimate illusion.

Movie.Title: Character
Movie.Plot: Jacob Katadreuffe lives mute with his mother, has no contact with his father who only works against him and wants to become a lawyer, at all costs.

Movie.Title: Cargo
Movie.Plot: A young backpacker gets into some trouble in Africa and stows away on a cargo ship heading to Europe.

Movie.Title: To Joy
Movie.Plot: Two violinists playing in the same orchestra fall in love and get married, but they can't get along.
